name: Xi'an
title: Xi'an - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Xi'an, the ancient capital of China, is a city steeped in history. It served as the capital for 13 dynasties and is home to the world-famous Terracotta Army. Today, it's a bustling metropolis that has beautifully preserved its rich cultural heritage.

highlights.attractions: Terracotta Army, Ancient City Wall, Big Wild Goose Pagoda, Muslim Quarter
highlights.cuisine: Roujiamo (meat burger), Yangrou Paomo (mutton soup with flatbread), Biangbiang Noodles
highlights.bestTime: Autumn (September to November) with mild temperatures and clear skies.

dishes.name: Roujiamo (meat burger)
dishes.description: A local specialty of spiced meat stuffed in a crispy flatbread.

dishes.name: Yangrou Paomo (mutton soup with flatbread)
dishes.description: A hearty soup with shredded flatbread and tender mutton.

dishes.name: Biangbiang Noodles
dishes.description: Wide, hand-pulled noodles with a spicy sauce.

foodStreets.name: Muslim Quarter
foodStreets.description: Famous food street with traditional halal cuisine and local snacks.

foodStreets.name: Yongxingfang
foodStreets.description: Modern food court showcasing Xi'an's culinary heritage.

gettingThere: By Air: Xi'an Xianyang International Airport (XIY) with domestic and international flights.
By Train: Major high-speed rail hub connecting to Beijing, Shanghai, and other cities.
By Bus: Long-distance bus services from nearby provinces and cities.
gettingAround: Metro: Xi'an Metro provides efficient transportation to major attractions.
Bus: Comprehensive public bus network covering all districts.
Taxi/Didi: Readily available for convenient travel.
Bike-sharing: Convenient for exploring the ancient city walls and historic areas.

activities: Morning: Visit the world-famous Terracotta Army archaeological site.
Afternoon: Explore the Ancient City Wall, one of the best-preserved in China.
Evening: Stroll through the Muslim Quarter for dinner and shopping.
Morning: Visit the Big Wild Goose Pagoda and its surrounding temple complex.
Afternoon: Explore the Shaanxi History Museum for ancient artifacts.
Evening: Enjoy traditional Tang Dynasty music and dance show.
Morning: Visit the Xi'an Museum and Small Wild Goose Pagoda.
Afternoon: Explore modern shopping districts and local markets.
Evening: Experience Xi'an's vibrant nightlife and modern dining scene.
